table.name: civicrm_mailing_job
table.comment: Stores information about the job that executes this mailing

field.name: mailing_id
field.comment: The ID of the mailing this Job will send.

field.name: scheduled_date
field.comment: date on which this job was scheduled.

field.name: start_date
field.comment: date on which this job was started.

field.name: end_date
field.comment: date on which this job ended.

field.name: status
field.values: Scheduled, Running, Complete, Paused, Canceled, Testing
